attributes.title: Raw
attributes.review: This app seems sketchy to me donâ€™t download this app..they ask for youâ€™re phone number and you never know what they can do to youâ€™re number be careful with this app doesnâ€™t seem safe especially if the government has our numbers and can send us text..stay stay and please donâ€™t download it not worth it.

attributes.title: this app is dangerous
attributes.review: after i downloaded the app, which took almost a day, i put my phone number in to see what to do and i started getting random messages daily from companies trying to get my credit card info and where i live. within a week of having this app i was getting scam phone calls telling me to pay my car before it gets taken away and they were telling me to give my credit info. this has never happened before but it started happening when i downloaded the app. never will i recommend this app to anybody.
